Package javelin.controller.fight.minigame

Class Minigame

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.fight.Fight
      • javelin.controller.fight.minigame.Minigame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Arena, Battlefield, CrimsonWar, MonsterMadness
    public abstract class Minigame
extends Fight
    A minigame is a battle totally independent from the normal game Squad . It usually has differing objectives, mechanics and overall dynamics.

      • onend

        public boolean onend()
        Description copied from class: Fight
        Called when a battle ends but before EndBattle clean-ups.
        Overrides:
        onend in class Fight
        Returns:
        If true will perform a bunch of post-battle clean-ups, usually required only for typical Scenario battles but not for Minigames.

      • start

        public boolean start()
        Launches this minigame, offering a chance for it to do some setup actions.
